name: petal-dance
caption: Petal Dance

effect.short: Hits every turn for 2-3 turns, then confuses the user.
effect.full:
Inflicts [regular damage]{mechanic:regular-damage}.  User is forced to attack with this move for 2â€“3 turns,selected at random.  After the last hit, the user becomes [confused]{mechanic:confused}.

[]{move:safeguard} does not protect against the [confusion]{mechanic:confusion} from this move.

flavorText:
The user attacks the target by scattering petals for
two to three turns. The user then becomes confused.
